originalText.text: Dr Guo is an excellent acupuncturist, I have known him for 8 years. The many times I have visited his office for a physical issue, he has been able to make me feel much better. I have also recommended my family/friends and all have been upmost satisfied with his services in feeling better after attending 2 to 4 times sessions. Depends on the physical issue.

originalText.text:
On my way to the AMC village 7 movie theater to see the nun 2, I happen to walk by and see essence acupuncture. I've always wanted to try acupuncture, and on my day off, I figured I would give it a try. Especially that I ve been having some shoulder pain for a while along with both calfs being tight and my lower back.
So, while in the movie theater, I booked an appointment after the movie. The movie ended earlier than expected, and I called to see if I could come in a half hour earlier than the appointment I previously booked. Dr. G had no problem with it and asked me my ailments along with documentation. The best experience I've ever had and walked out of there with less shoulder and no back pain at all. My calfs felt the best ever and not as tight as they were previously. I will be back for follow-up treatments and definitely well worth the experience of relief. Thanks, DR. G.

On my way to the AMC village 7 movie theater to see the nun 2, I happen to walk by and see essence acupuncture. I've always wanted to try acupuncture, and on my day off, I figured I would give it a try. Especially that I ve been having some shoulder pain for a while along with both calfs being tight and my lower back.
So, while in the movie theater, I booked an appointment after the movie. The movie ended earlier than expected, and I called to see if I could come in a half hour earlier than the appointment I previously booked. Dr. G had no problem with it and asked me my ailments along with documentation. The best experience I've ever had and walked out of there with less shoulder and no back pain at all. My calfs felt the best ever and not as tight as they were previously. I will be back for follow-up treatments and definitely well worth the experience of relief. Thanks, DR. G.

originalText.text: Dr G is great. I have more energy, a good sense of well being and less pain after seeing him. He is always caring and thoughtful. I see him regularly and highly recommend Essence Acupuncture.
